scripts.dev: sh -c 'PORT=${ESTOQUEUNI_AI_PORT:-${PORT:-5002}}; PID=$(ss -ltnp 2>/dev/null | awk "/:${PORT} / && /LISTEN/ {split(\$NF,a,\"=\"); split(a[2],b,\",*\"); print b[1]}"); if [ -n \"$PID\" ]; then kill $PID || true; fi; ESTOQUEUNI_ENV_PATH=./.env PORT=$PORT ESTOQUEUNI_AI_PORT=$PORT nodemon src/index.js'
scripts.dev-apps: sh -c 'PORT=${ESTOQUEUNI_AI_PORT:-${PORT:-5002}}; PID=$(ss -ltnp 2>/dev/null | awk "/:${PORT} / && /LISTEN/ {split(\$NF,a,\"=\"); split(a[2],b,\",*\"); print b[1]}"); if [ -n \"$PID\" ]; then kill $PID || true; fi; ESTOQUEUNI_ENV_PATH=./.env PORT=$PORT ESTOQUEUNI_AI_PORT=$PORT nodemon src/index.js'
